title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, August 2, 2021
description: On this day in 1776 the Declaration of Independence was signed in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, not on the fourth of July as is popularly believed.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1776 the Declaration of Independence was signed in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, not on the fourth of July as is popularly believed.
